System.M_CLRCTL001: SELECT RTRIM(CLR.CLR_KEY) AS CODE, RTRIM(CLR.CLR_NAME) AS NAME FROM M_CLRCTL AS CLR $WHERE
System.M_CLRCTL500: SELECT RTRIM(CLR.CLR_KEY) AS CLR_KEY, RTRIM(CLR.USERID) AS USERID, CLR.CLR_RED AS CLR_RED, CLR.CLR_GREEN AS CLR_GREEN, CLR.CLR_BLUE AS CLR_BLUE, CLR.CLR_ALPHA AS CLR_ALPHA, CLR.CLR_HELP AS CLR_HELP, RTRIM(CLR.CLR_NAME) ASCLR_NAME FROM M_CLRCTL AS CLR WHERE CLR.USERID = ?
System.M_CLRCTL501: SELECT RTRIM(COLORCLS_CODE) AS COLORCLS_CODE , RTRIM(COLOR_CODE) AS COLOR_CODE , RTRIM(COLOR_NAME) AS COLOR_NAME , RTRIM(COLOR_RNAME) AS COLOR_RNAME , DEFAULT_TYPE , DSP_FLG , DSPORDER_NO , COLORTYPE , BCLR_RED , BCLR_GREEN , BCLR_BLUE , FCLR_RED , FCLR_GREEN , FCLR_BLUE , ADD_USER , ADD_PC , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , LASTUP_USER , LASTUP_PC , LASTUP_DATE , LASTUP_TIME FROM M_COLOR $WHERE ORDER BY DSPORDER_NO
